feed.title: Big Trout Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h in the morning then light late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 25. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023
